content.query:
IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.STG_superhero_raw') IS NOT NULL
    DROP TABLE stage1.STG_superhero_raw
GO

CREATE TABLE stage1.STG_superhero_raw (
    [NAME] VARCHAR(1000),
    [URL] VARCHAR(4000),
    [INTELLIGENCE] VARCHAR(100),
    [STRENGTH] VARCHAR(100),
    [SPEED] VARCHAR(100),
    [DURABILITY] VARCHAR(100),
    [POWER] VARCHAR(100),
    [COMBAT] VARCHAR(100),
    [FULL_NAME] VARCHAR(100),
    [ALTER_EGOS] NVARCHAR(MAX),
    [ALIASES] NVARCHAR(MAX),
    [PLACE_OF_BIRTH] VARCHAR(100),
    [FIRST_APPEARANCE] VARCHAR(4000),
    [CREATOR] VARCHAR(100),
    [ALIGNMENT] VARCHAR(100),
    [GENDER] VARCHAR(20),
    [RACE] VARCHAR(20),
    [HEIGHT] VARCHAR(20),
    [WEIGHT] VARCHAR(20),
    [EYE_COLOR] VARCHAR(10),
    [HAIR_COLOR] VARCHAR(10),
    [OCCUPATION] VARCHAR(100),
    [BASE] VARCHAR(100),
    [TEAM_AFFILIATION] VARCHAR(4000),
    [RELATIVES] VARCHAR(4000),
    [SKIN_COLOR] VARCHAR(10),
    [TOTAL_POWER] VARCHAR(100)
)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 HEAP
	)
GO


COPY INTO stage1.STG_superhero_raw
    ([NAME] 1, [URL] 2, [INTELLIGENCE] 3, [STRENGTH] 4, [SPEED] 5, [DURABILITY] 6, 
    [POWER] 7, [COMBAT] 8, [FULL_NAME] 9, [ALTER_EGOS] 10, [ALIASES] 11, [PLACE_OF_BIRTH] 12, 
    [FIRST_APPEARANCE] 13, [CREATOR] 14, [ALIGNMENT] 15, [GENDER] 16, [RACE] 17, [HEIGHT] 18, 
    [WEIGHT] 19, [EYE_COLOR] 20, [HAIR_COLOR] 21, [OCCUPATION] 22, [BASE] 23, [TEAM_AFFILIATION] 24, 
    [RELATIVES] 25, [SKIN_COLOR] 26, [TOTAL_POWER] 27)
FROM 'https://synapsedvdemo.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/Data/superherodb/SUPERHERO_RAW.csv'
WITH
    (
        FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
        ,MAXERRORS = 1000
        ,FIRSTROW = 2
        ,ERRORFILE = 'https://synapsedvdemo.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/'
        ,CREDENTIAL = ( IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity' )
        ,ERRORFILE_CREDENTIAL = ( IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity' )
    )

GO

SELECT *
FROM stage1.STG_superhero_raw
